name: eBay Commerce Connector
description: Connector powering Salsify's eBay integration. This service powers both the content publish and inventory/orders integrations, enabling customers to sync product content, inventory, and orders with eBay marketplaces.

links.description: eBay Connection Readiness Report Mapping (Knowledge Base)

name: eBay US Marketplace
description: The primary eBay marketplace for the United States, used as a marketplace identifier (MARKETPLACE_ID) when generating eBay schemas and category mappings in the eBay Commerce Connector.

name: eBay Motors US Marketplace
description: The eBay Motors marketplace for the United States, a specialized marketplace for automotive parts and vehicles with its own category structure and item aspects.
